meanings.sent1: She misaddressed the letter by mistake.
meanings.sent2: The package was misaddressed and ended up at the wrong house.
meanings.sent3: He misaddressed the invitation, causing confusion among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The misaddressed email went to the spam folder instead of the inbox.
meanings.sent5: The misaddressed package was returned to the sender due to the wrong label.

meanings.definition: To send to the wrong address.
meanings.sent1: Please do not misaddress the important documents.
meanings.sent2: The post office accidentally misaddressed the package.
meanings.sent3: He misaddressed the letter to his old address, causing a delay in delivery.
meanings.sent4: Misaddressing the package led to a delay in receiving the order.
meanings.sent5: She realized she misaddressed the envelope after it was already sent.
